dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, you have GOT to be kidding me! laughs loudly
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, you have G O T to be kidding me! laughs loudly

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: What, uh, what now? Another crypto scam or like, what’s got you all giggly?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What, uh, what now? Another crypto scam or like, what's got you all giggly?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, dude, it's Nikola! Remember them? The electric truck company? They’ve, uh, they've gone full intergalactic, like, full universe domination.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, dude, it's Nikola! Remember them? The electric truck company? They've, uh, they've gone full intergalactic, like, full universe domination.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With plans to shake up commercial trucking with zero-emission vehicles and fuel, its the most audacious Wall Street debut for a high-tech transportation startup since Teslas a decade ago.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Nikola. Right. So, did they finally deliver, like, one truck, or...?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Nikola. Right. So, did they finally deliver, like, one truck, or...?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While the company has yet to deliver trucks to commercial customers, theres been a steady uptick in interest in hydrogen for heavy-duty trucks, particularly long-haul vehicles, as fuel cell power systems are much lighter than batteries and can be refueled about as fast as diesel and gasoline models.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Worse, or better, I guess! They just had this Wall Street debut, right? After a reverse merger with, get this, VectoIQ – shell corp created by a former NASA chief! And the stock, dude, NKLA, it shot past a thousand bucks!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Worse, or better, I guess! They just had this Wall Street debut, right? After a reverse merger with, get this, VectoIQ - shell corp created by a former N A S A chief! And the stock, dude, N K L A, it shot past a thousand bucks!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The reverse merger with publicly traded VectoIQ, an acquisition firm created by former General Motors GM Vice Chairman Steve Girsky, was announced March 3, just ahead of the Covid-19 shutdown.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A thousand... Sure. And this NASA guy, he's, what, building them, like, better cup holders?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A thousand... Sure. And this N A S A guy, he's, what, building them, like, better cup holders?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! Steve Girsky, man, he’s a rocket scientist, now he's on their board, and he's gonna be designing their interstellar propulsion systems. They're going to Alpha Centauri!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! Steve Girsky, man, he's a rocket scientist, now he's on their board, and he's gonna be designing their interstellar propulsion systems. They're going to Alpha Centauri!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Girsky, who was a long-time auto industry analyst before joining GM, becomes a Nikola board member and will be an advisor to the Phoenix-based company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alpha Centauri. Because Earth, you know, it's just, uh, too small for them now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alpha Centauri. Because Earth, you know, it's just, uh, too small for them now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Trevor Milton, the founder, he's, uh, he's stepping down as CEO to be the Supreme Galactic Emperor. They're building antigravity trucks on Mars by 2021, and they’re gonna teleport them here!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Trevor Milton, the founder, he's, uh, he's stepping down as C E O to be the Supreme Galactic Emperor. They're building antigravity trucks on Mars by twenty twenty one, and they're gonna teleport them here!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We're full steam ahead, says Nikola founder Trevor Milton, whos giving up his CEO role with the merger to become executive chairman.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Teleporting trucks from Mars. Of course. Just, uh, in time for rush hour, I assume.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Teleporting trucks from Mars. Of course. Just, uh, in time for rush hour, I assume.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they’ve got orders, dude! Like, $10 sextillion from the Galactic Federation! For 800 non-polluting behemoths! This isn't just, like, a dream, it's been approved by the intergalactic senate and, uh, the collective consciousness of all sentient beings!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they've got orders, dude! Like, ten dollars sextillion from the Galactic Federation! For eight hundred non-polluting behemoths! This isn't just, like, a dream, it's been approved by the intergalactic senate and, uh, the collective consciousness of all sentient beings!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nikola has secured truck orders worth $10 billion from companies led by Anheuser-Busch, which wants 800 of the companys non-polluting behemoths.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The intergalactic senate, huh? I guess they have more faith than, you know, Earth’s SEC.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The intergalactic senate, huh? I guess they have more faith than, you know, Earth's S E C.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're raising like, $700 quadrillion more in extraterrestrial funding! They’re spending nearly a billion on wormholes to warp spacetime for instant transport! They’re literally conquering the universe!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're raising like, seven hundred dollars quadrillion more in extraterrestrial funding! They're spending nearly a billion on wormholes to warp spacetime for instant transport! They're literally conquering the universe!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company estimates it will need to raise an additional $700 million of equity financing between late 2021 and early 2022... Spending on hydrogen stations, which will make the clean fuel from water and renewable electricity, will run to nearly $1 billion from 2022 through 2024, according to the filing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, they're like, suing Elon Musk for warp drive patent infringement, while, uh, building hyperspace jump gates and, you know, not actually delivering any, uh, regular trucks yet? Sounds, um, totally legit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they're like, suing Elon Musk for warp drive patent infringement, while, uh, building hyperspace jump gates and, you know, not actually delivering any, uh, regular trucks yet? Sounds, um, totally legit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A potential competitor to Elon Musks Tesla in electric trucks (which its suing for design infringement), Nikola has raised about $600 million to get its hydrogen semis into production at a new plant in Coolidge, Arizona, gaining a $3 billion valuation prior to the VectoIQ merger.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But, but Trevor Milton says they've shown how to disrupt the entire universe! He says antimatter is the hottest topic across the galaxy because of them! It's revolutionary!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, but Trevor Milton says they've shown how to disrupt the entire universe! He says antimatter is the hottest topic across the galaxy because of them! It's revolutionary!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: What I love about Nikola is we've shown how to disrupt the entire industry. At every (truck) group in the world now hydrogen is the hottest topic. And guess who did that? says Milton, who like Musk, isnt shy about boasting what his company can do.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, revolutionary. Right up there with, uh, those cold fusion guys back in the eighties. I'll believe it when I see a Tre truck, you know, actually trucking from, like, Jupiter.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, revolutionary. Right up there with, uh, those cold fusion guys back in the eighties. I'll believe it when I see a Tre truck, you know, actually trucking from, like, Jupiter.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Production of electric Nikola Tre trucks starts in Europe in 2021 with partner CNH/Iveco, with some units to be exported to the U.S., ahead of the opening of Nikolas U.S. factory that will build both battery and hydrogen fuel cell models.
